title: SBI appoints ex-Ujjivan Small Finance Bank CEO Nitin Chugh as DMD - Mint
content: SBI appoints ex-Ujjivan Small Finance Bank CEO Nitin Chugh as DMD  Mint
description: Prior to this appointment, Chugh was CEO and managing director of Ujjivan Small Finance Bank.Â .He joined there from HDFC Bank where he served as the Group Head of Digital Banking.
